评论详情: I purchased this for a costume, and it was perfect for the look that I was trying to achieve.  I wore it for 2 Halloween parties.  After the second wear, my wrist turned green.  Not suggested for long term use.
I like this product,my only issue is the clasp.Tends to pinch my skin.Otherwise great value for money,great to accessorize any look.
It’s very uncomfortable to wear. Not a good look due to the spring that open & closes.
This bangle is beautiful and makes a statement.

I absolutely love this cuff and quality is amazing. Whenever you want that little extra color to add to your outfit this is perfect to add to make your outfit pop. The fit is perfect and the value for money is awesome.
I love this Bangle! I originally bought it for a photo shoot but I actually wear it everyday. Would definitely recommend!
Really stylish and well made. I purchased two to stack them. Together they’re a little snug but individually, perfection. Definitely worth the price.
